title: Ostbayerische Technische Hochschule Regensburg (OTH Regensburg)
desc: OTH Regensburg is a German university of applied sciences, offering a variety of degree programs in engineering, business, and social sciences. Located in the city of Regensburg, the university has a strong focus on practical education and research, preparing students for successful careers in their fields.

title: Regensburg Arcaden
desc: Regensburg Arcaden is a shopping center located in the city of Regensburg, Germany. With over 120 shops, restaurants, and services, Regensburg Arcaden offers a diverse range of shopping and leisure options for visitors of all ages. The center also features ample parking and convenient access to public transportation.

title: Old Stone Bridge
desc: The Old Stone Bridge is a medieval bridge in Regensburg, Germany, spanning the Danube River. Built in the 12th century, it is an iconic symbol of the city's cultural heritage and offers stunning views to visitors.

formatted_address: Champ de Mars, 5 Av. Anatole France, 75007 Paris, France
title: Eiffel Tower
desc: The Eiffel Tower is an iconic landmark located in Paris, France. Built in 1889, it is a global symbol of engineering and architectural achievement, and is one of the world's most visited tourist attractions.

formatted_address: 100 London Rd, London SE23 3PQ, United Kingdom
title: Horniman Museum and Gardens
desc: The Horniman Museum and Gardens is a museum of anthropology and natural history located in Forest Hill, London. With a vast collection of over 350,000 objects, the museum offers visitors an immersive and interactive learning experience.

formatted_address: 130 S Bryn Mawr Ave, Bryn Mawr, PA 19010, United States
title: Bryn Mawr Hospital
desc: Bryn Mawr Hospital is a healthcare facility located in Bryn Mawr, Pennsylvania, USA. Founded in 1893, it is a leading hospital in the region, providing a wide range of medical services and treatments.
